type: Legendary Creature – Human Pegasus Cleric Noble
rules_text:
Flying, lifelink
[i]Stronger Bond[/i] – Mounts you control get +2/+1. Creature tokens you control get +1/+2.
[i]Soar Together[/i] – Whenever Marianne, Clearer View attacks, create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.
